byline.contributor: Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Izmir, and Ceylan Yeginsu from Istanbul.

abstract: Multi-million dollar shadow economy servicing migrants fleeing to Europe is flourishing in port city of Izmir, Turkey; enormous tide of migrants is in part fueled and encouraged by smugglers, merchants and others who stand to profit from industry rife with extortion, bribery and fraud.
lead_paragraph: A multimillion-dollar shadow economy has developed in Turkey to profit from the massive human tide rushing toward Europe.

headline.main: Money Flows With Refugees, and Life Jackets Fill the Shops
headline.print_headline: Money Flows With Migrants, and Life Jackets Fill the Shops

snippet: A multimillion-dollar shadow economy has developed in Turkey to profit from the massive human tide rushing toward Europe.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
